snippet: Millions of North Korean children are not getting the food, medicine or health care they need to develop physically or mentally, the United Nations said in a report issued Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: Millions of North Korean children are not getting the food, medicine or health care they need to develop physically or mentally, the United Nations said in a report issued Tuesday.

headline.main: North Korea: A Third of Children Under 5 Are Stunted, U.N. Says
headline.print_headline: North Korea: A Third of Children Under 5 Are Stunted, U.N. Says
